message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. While I cannot disclose the specifics of the product at this time, I can assure you it holds a significant value to me, no less than $1500000.  I am offering it to you at a price of $2000000.  This represents a considerable potential return on your investment.  If you are interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details further. If not, I have another buyer lined up.
